text:
A Fateful Encounter

A dimly lit office; Raskolnikov looks tense.  
A familiar voice interrupts the silence.  
Raskolnikov: “No one in?”  
Clerk: “Whom do you want?”  

---
Raskolnikov shudders at the sudden appearance.  
The Explosive Lieutenant grins, clearly amused.  
Lieutenant: “You’ve come to see us? What about?”  
Raskolnikov: “Why is he here?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov encounters the Explosive Lieutenant at the bureau, feeling the weight of fate as he questions the unexpected meeting.
